title: Bazooka Bear: the 4 legendary lamps.
content:
Because ezboard got attacked i need to open a new topic for the mod i'm working on [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] .
As you probably know i already edited the *txt.ck1 files and use modkeen2 for the sprites and tiles so i can edit them with mspaint. But here's the current progress.(no screenshots yet sorry).
I tried editing the tiled of the ship parts but they look like crap to me so i have overwritten it with the original tiles.
So here is little request could you make ine of the part tiles look like an ancient lamps(the kind believed to have an genie in them). I would really appreciate it if you did(might even throw you in the credits). I almost finished the logo file so i might post it after i finished it. This is not real.
You did not see this.
You werent here.
